item.title: v0.2.1 2024-03-23
item.content:encoded:
Release Notes

Refactor

  • Add helix like keymaps by @ymgyt (257beaad)
  • Use cloned instead of map by @ymgyt (ae03934c)

item.title: v0.1.8 2024-03-23
item.content:encoded:
Release Notes

Miscellaneous Tasks

  • Disable cargo-dist due to .cargo/config by @ymgyt (7407a67e)

item.title: v0.1.10 2024-03-19
item.content:encoded:
Release Notes

Features

  • Make the order of keymap help consistent by @ymgyt (76d385e3)
  • Change time format delimiter by @ymgyt (b0768bc1)
  • Change entry column name by @ymgyt (fd15bf63)

Miscellaneous Tasks

  • Set log level for the credential restore process to debug by @ymgyt (30dc7a2f)

Install synd-term 0.1.10

Install prebuilt binaries via shell script

curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -LsSf https://github.com/ymgyt/syndicationd/releases/download/synd-term-v0.1.10/synd-term-installer.sh | sh

Install prebuilt binaries via powershell script

powershell -c "irm https://github.com/ymgyt/syndicationd/releases/download/synd-term-v0.1.10/synd-term-installer.ps1 | iex"

Install prebuilt binaries into your npm project

npm install @syndicationd/synd-term@0.1.10

Install prebuilt binaries via Homebrew

brew install ymgyt/homebrew-syndicationd/synd

Download synd-term 0.1.10

File Platform Checksum
synd-term-aarch64-apple-darwin.tar.gz Apple Silicon macOS checksum
synd-term-x86_64-apple-darwin.tar.gz Intel macOS checksum
synd-term-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc.tar.gz x64 Windows checksum
synd-term-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.gz x64 Linux checksum
synd-term-x86_64-unknown-linux-musl.tar.gz x64 MUSL Linux checksum

item.title: v0.1.9 2024-03-18
item.content:encoded:
Release Notes

Features

  • Fallback latest entries published date by @ymgyt (98b57a10)
  • Handle ctrl-c by @ymgyt (ef2842e2)
  • Make the space policy consistent by @ymgyt (0a3d9dfb)
  • Change detail border type by @ymgyt (099c8524)
  • Change feed meta widget from list to table by @ymgyt (f583e2f2)

Bug Fixes

  • Remove debug logging by @ymgyt (066b3cc0)

Refactor

  • Rename jwt_decoder to jwt_service by @ymgyt (fa6f178c)

item.title: v0.1.6 2024-03-17
item.content:encoded:
Release Notes

Features

  • Set graphql depth and complexity limit by @ymgyt (54b44e88)

  • Support google oidc by @ymgyt (c7c81fd8)

Miscellaneous Tasks

  • Remove unused headers crate by @ymgyt (2eaf00db)
  • Inc gql complexity limit by @ymgyt (f7ac84b5)

item.title: v0.1.4 - 2024-02-23
item.content:encoded:
Release Notes

Features

  • Use env var as default flag value by @ymgyt (c7887e92)
  • Handle subscribe feed error by @ymgyt (d6abb26e)
  • Use entry updated if published is none by @ymgyt (2b16b51c)
  • Add feed detail widget by @ymgyt (836258d4)
  • Add reload by @ymgyt (de11397c)

Bug Fixes

  • Use name instead of bin_name by @ymgyt (1a9b81dd)

Miscellaneous Tasks

  • Set clap bin_name by @ymgyt (dca2b898)
  • Configure feed detail height by @ymgyt (3de1c98f)

Install synd-term 0.1.4

Install prebuilt binaries via shell script

curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -LsSf https://github.com/ymgyt/syndicationd/releases/download/synd-term-v0.1.4/synd-term-installer.sh | sh

Install prebuilt binaries via powershell script

powershell -c "irm https://github.com/ymgyt/syndicationd/releases/download/synd-term-v0.1.4/synd-term-installer.ps1 | iex"

Install prebuilt binaries into your npm project

npm install @syndicationd/synd-term@0.1.4

Install prebuilt binaries via Homebrew

brew install ymgyt/homebrew-syndicationd/synd

item.title: synd-api-v0.1.3
item.content:encoded:
Features

  • Handle subscribe feed error by @ymgyt (90c47d3f)
  • Use updated if published is none by @ymgyt (9967dc10)
  • Add generator resolver in feed by @ymgyt (f8de4aa4)
  • Resolve entry content if there is no summary by @ymgyt (0459e71c)
